New Records: West Indies have shown confidence with their recent performances in IPL 2024, with players like Andre Russell and Nicholas Pooran excelling.
Key Match Events: West Indies defeated Australia in their warm-up match, with notable performances from key players.
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies have a poor recent record in T20 World Cups but are optimistic heading into 2024. They also won their warm-up match against Australia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first T20I match between West Indies and Papua New Guinea.
Others: The match will be played at the Providence Stadium in Guyana on June 2, 2024.
